data.name: Ohm Cloud
data.detailed_description: Get up to 200 Projects in your Ohm Studio account!
data.about_the_game: Get up to 200 Projects in your Ohm Studio account!
data.short_description: Get up to 200 Projects in your Ohm Studio account!
data.reviews:
“Ohm Studio now frees us from the previous limitations that we may not have even been aware of. The future is here.”
9/10 – MusicTech

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or Athlon 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 9 years old graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX/MME compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: (disk space depends on how many projects you make)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or Athlon 64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 years old graphic card or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: (disk space depends on how many projects you make)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.5.8
  • Processor: Intel Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: (disk space depends on how many projects you make)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Original graphic card or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: CoreAudio compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: (disk space depends on how many projects you make)
